title: Font Generation Websites
content:
I am so bummed that the Alphabet Synthesis Machine is gone! ( [http://alphabet.tmema.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425030339/http:/alphabet.tmema.org/ "http://alphabet.tmema.org"))

My FontLab class has an exercise that is centered around that, so now I am looking for a replacement. What other font creating machines are there online? I've been searching and haven't found anything.

All suggestions appreciated!

Thanks.
author: abecedarienne

comments.content: Hey Amy. [Rob Meek](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425030339/http:/robmeek.com/) has some really interesting TT generators on his site. Love them dials and toggles.

Thanks for that, Stephen.

That's a start.
